thread.title: Nicky Saunderson

author: Nicky Saunderson
title: Nicky Saunderson
text: Booked on Monday, and they called straight away to confirm the time window for Wednesday. I was also then call 30 mins beforehand to confirm exactly when Stuart L would arrive. Both tyres replaced in 30 mins, with others things like breaks and other tyres checked too (and no problems reported). Will definitely use them again.
